description: Jenny is the younger sister of a friend of http://anidb.net/ch528 [Nagi]`s; she appears in a flashback accompanying Nagi in Africa when they find http://anidb.net/ch679 [Tama]. Despite being four years old in the flashback, she looks nothing like her age and carries a lighter in the shape of a rifle. She also claims to have ninja skills.
name: Jenny
